statements: SELECT * FROM sports_memorabilia_assets;
SELECT asset_name, sport_type FROM sports_memorabilia_assets WHERE year_created > 2000;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, year_created FROM sports_memorabilia_assets ORDER BY year_created DESC;
SELECT * FROM sports_memorabilia_assets WHERE sport_type = 'Basketball' AND authenticity_status = true;
SELECT asset_name, token_id FROM sports_memorabilia_assets WHERE token_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM sports_memorabilia_assets ORDER BY asset_name DESC, year_created ASC, sport_type;
SELECT asset_name, year_created, sport_type FROM sports_memorabilia_assets WHERE authenticity_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM sports_memorabilia_assets WHERE year_created BETWEEN 1990 AND 2000 ORDER BY year_created DESC;
SELECT asset_name, sport_type, token_id FROM sports_memorabilia_assets WHERE sport_type='Basketball' AND authenticity_status = TRUE;
SELECT asset_name, year_created FROM sports_memorabilia_assets WHERE sport_type IN ('Basketball', 'Football') ORDER BY year_created ASC;
SELECT * FROM sports_assets;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM sports_assets WHERE trading_status = TRUE;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type, asset_token_id FROM sports_assets WHERE asset_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM authentication WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT asset_name, asset_token_id FROM sports_assets WHERE asset_type = 'Football' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM sports_assets WHERE asset_type = 'Football' AND trading_status = TRUE;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM sports_assets WHERE asset_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY asset_name DESC;
SELECT asset_id, asset_type FROM sports_assets WHERE trading_status = FALSE ORDER BY asset_id ASC;

SELECT * FROM sports_assets INNER JOIN authentication ON sports_assets.asset_id = authentication.asset_id WHERE authentication.action_type = 'login' AND authentication.timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY authentication.timestamp DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_assets, asset_type FROM sports_assets GROUP BY asset_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY total_assets DESC;
SELECT * FROM sports_memorabilia_assets;
SELECT asset_name, token_owner, asset_type FROM sports_memorabilia_assets ORDER BY asset_name DESC;
SELECT asset_id, token_owner FROM sports_memorabilia_assets WHERE asset_type = 'Jersey';
SELECT * FROM trading_platform WHERE platform_fee > 0;
SELECT platform_name, platform_location FROM trading_platform ORDER BY platform_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM sports_memorabilia_assets WHERE asset_type = 'Football' LIMIT 10;
SELECT asset_name, token_owner FROM sports_memorabilia_assets WHERE token_owner LIKE '%John%';
SELECT platform_name, platform_location FROM trading_platform WHERE platform_type = 'Auction';
SELECT * FROM asset_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM asset_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Sale';
SELECT * FROM assets;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM assets WHERE asset_value > 1000;
SELECT * FROM owners WHERE owner_phone IS NOT NULL;
SELECT owner_name FROM owners WHERE owner_email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT transaction_date, transaction_type, transaction_amount FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM assets WHERE asset_type = 'Equipment';
SELECT asset_name, asset_value FROM assets ORDER BY asset_value DESC;
SELECT owner_id, owner_name FROM owners WHERE owner_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT asset_id, MAX(asset_value) AS max_value FROM assets GROUP BY asset_id;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Sale' ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM AssetTokens;
SELECT asset_name, token_owner FROM AssetTokens WHERE asset_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM TokenTransactions ORDER BY transaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT transaction_type FROM TokenTransactions;
SELECT authenticator_name, authentication_key FROM Authenticators WHERE trusted = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM AssetTokens;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name FROM AssetTokens ORDER BY asset_name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT token_owner FROM AssetTokens;
SELECT asset_id, token_id, asset_name, token_owner FROM AssetTokens WHERE asset_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM TokenTransactions INNER JOIN AssetTokens ON TokenTransactions.token_id = AssetTokens.token_id;
